body_html:
@soumith You are right, and because of that I manually set 5.2 and it compiled well. However in runtime it still fails. Had to recompile again with setting 6.1, then it works.

I was confused that 5.2 does not seem to be forward-compatible with 6.1 in runtime (and that PyTorch doesn't error out nicely)
and my old grievance is #4716 which doesn't catch trying to implicitly compile for 2.0 on machines with a small desktop gpu.
